mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, product_id AS productId, quantity, create_time AS createTime FROM cart_item WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
SELECT id, user_id AS userId, product_id AS productId, quantity, create_time AS createTime FROM cart_item WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, user_id AS userId, product_id AS productId, quantity, create_time AS createTime FROM cart_item WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_item(user_id, product_id, quantity, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, NOW())
